bibl.title: Alexandria. Auditoria of Kom el-Dikka and Late Antique Education. (The Journal of Juristic Papyrology. Supplements. Volume VIII.)

DERDA Tomasz, Tomasz MARKIEWICZ and Ewa WIPSZYCKA (Edd.), Alexandria. Auditoria of Kom el-Dikka and Late Antique Education. (The Journal of Juristic Papyrology. Supplements. Volume VIII.)
